revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FighterAttack}} '''A_FighterAttack'''
Shoots a volley of five {{Class|FSwordMissile}} from the calling actor's position and a relative height of 32 map units and plays the sound "FighterSwordFire" on the WEAPON channel. The middle missile is aimed directly at the calling actor's target, the four others are spread at angles of 11.25° and 5.625° on both sides.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FighterBoss}} and derived classes.
{{DEFAULTSORT:FighterAttack}}[[Category:Decorate Classic attack functions]] [[category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
